snippet: Five Olympic medalists and other current and former members of the United States speedskating team have accused Coach Jae Su Chun of verbal, physical and psychological abuse.
abstract: Five Olympic medalists and other current and former members of the United States speedskating team have accused coach Jae Su Chun of verbal, physical and psychological abuse.
lead_paragraph: Five Olympic medalists and other current and former members of the United States speedskating team have accused Coach Jae Su Chun of verbal, physical and psychological abuse.

headline.main: Speedskating Coach Is Accused of Abuse
